#Text=Wikinews Shorts : April 27 , 2007
#Text=A compilation of brief news reports for Friday , April 27 , 2007 .
#Text=Stephen Hawking goes weightless
#Text=65-year-old scientist
#Text=Stephen Hawking took a ride on the " Vomit Comet " , an airplane producing weightlessness by following a parabolic flight path .

column3:
object[16]	new[16]	_	_
5-9	192-197	Vomit	abstract|object[16]	new|new[16]	_	_
5-10	198-203	Comet	object[16]	new[16]	_	_
5-11	204-205

column1: #Text=He did this to show awareness for space exploration .
#Text=The flight took off and landed at the Kennedy Space Center in Florida .
#Text=Hawking , who is confined to a wheelchair due to a degenerative disease , was unstrapped from it while the plane made eight free-fall maneuvers that simulate zero-gravity to those on-board .
#Text=Hawking told reporters he enjoyed the zero-gravity part of his flight and other people with him said he " did n't want to come back " .
#Text=Hawking made the flight to draw attention to the importance of space exploration .
#Text=" I believe the human race has no future if it does n't go into space , " he said .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Irene Klotz .
#Text=" Hawking 's small step toward space " — BBC News Online , April 27 , 2007

#Text=Abdullah Gül does not get presidency in first round
#Text=Turkey 's Foreign Minister Abdullah Gül failed the first round of voting in parliament on Friday .
#Text=He received 357 votes ; 367 votes are required to win .
#Text=Opposition parties asked the Constitutional Court to stop the voting .
#Text=If the Constitutional Court rules in favor , a general election could be called .
#Text=A second round will be on May 2 .
#Text=If Gül does n't pick up the additional ten votes then , the process will move on to a third and if necessary a fourth round .
#Text=During those rounds , only a simple majority is needed so Gül seems assured of getting the presidency .
#Text=Related news
#Text=" Turkey 's governing party names Abdullah Gül as presidential candidate " — Wikinews , April 24 , 2007
#Text=Sources
#Text=" Turkey 's Gul fails to win presidency in first vote " — Reuters , April 27 , 2007
#Text=" Turkey 's Gul out in round one " — CNN , April 27 , 2007
#Text=Chinese cat reportedly gives birth to ' poodle '
#Text=A cat in Zhengzhou , China gave birth to four kittens of which one reportedly looks like a white poodle , says owner Zhang Qiming .
#Text=People from around the city are making visits to the house where the cat gave birth .
#Text=" It looks very different from the other kittens , and its mouth , nose and paws are all dog-like , " said owner Zhang Qiming .
#Text=" Also , its tail is one centimetre shorter than that of the other three kittens . "
#Text=There appears to be no proof other than the owner 's statements that " kitten " is a dog or that the cat in fact gave birth to it .
#Text=Sources
#Text=" Cat ' gives birth to puppy ' " — Independent Online ( South Africa ) , April 27 , 2007
#Text=" Cat ' gives birth to puppy ' " — Ananova , April 27 , 2007
#Text=Top al-Qaeda operative reported in US custody

#Text=Bryan Whitman , a spokesperson for the US Department of Defense , said today that the United States has captured Abdul Hadi al-Iraqi , whom it says has worked directly with the Taliban in Afghanistan .
#Text=Whitman said al-Iraqi was captured when trying to enter Iraq , presumably for the purposes of taking over al-Qaeda operations there .
#Text=He was taken to Guantanamo Bay about a week ago .
#Text=A US State Department website described al-Iraqi as " being a skilled , intelligent , and experienced commander and is an extremely well-respected al-Qaeda leader . "
#Text=Sources
#Text=Tony Capaccio .
#Text=" Top Al-Qaeda Operative Taken Into Custody , U.S. Says " — Bloomberg L.P. , April 27 , 2007
#Text=" US holds ' senior al-Qaeda figure ' " — BBC News Online , April 27 , 2007
